Instance Method# pauseTrip(for:description:turnCardColor:)

iOS 15.4+iPadOS 15.4+Mac Catalyst 15.4+

```
@MainActor
func pauseTrip(
    for reason: CPNavigationSession.PauseReason,
    description: String?,
```
